section.p: A sprawling single-storey cottage squats incongrously amid the thick black tree trunks. In front is a well from which a man in a homespun tunic is raising water. Hearing you approach, he turns and greets you cautiously.
‘I am Knocklar the hermit,’ he says. ‘I don’t get all that many visitors here in the Forest of the Forsaken. Are you lost?’
